title: **All your space needs covered! Walk in closets and more!
posting_body: ['The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', 'RENT:', '$2090 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '1026 - 1087 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '2', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Linen Closet', '❖ Range', '❖ Refrigerator', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Window Coverings', '❖ Accent Color Walls', '❖ Gas Fireplaces on Top Floors', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Patio/Balcony', '❖ Private Entrances', '❖ Spacious Floor Plans', '❖ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In Select Homes', '❖ Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '❖ Washer/Dryer', '❖ Water, Sewer & Trash Included', 'Part of the Your Tour, Your Way program.', "It's your apartment and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.", 'Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '❖ BBQ and Picnic Area', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Lounge', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Resident Business Center', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sprinkler System', '❖ Storage Space', '❖ 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '❖ Easy Access to I-25', '❖ Game Room with Shuffleboard', '❖ Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '❖ On-Site Management and Maintenance', '❖ Outdoor Lounge with Fire Pit', '❖ Short-term Lease Available', '❖ Sparkling Pool/Spa', '❖ State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '❖ Walk to Rock Park & Hiking Trails', 'PET POLICY:', 'The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '483 Scott Blvd', 'Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '493E218D1F814AD']
